Title: Relates to prohibiting health professionals from engaging in electroconvulsive therapy; creates the crime of performance of electroconvulsive therapy
Summary: Prohibits health professionals from engaging in electroconvulsive therapy; creates the crime of performance of electroconvulsive therapy.
LawCode: Add §§6509-f & 6531-b, Ed L; add §120.80, amd §60.27, Pen L; amd §§80.03 & 81.03, Ment Hyg L; amd §2504, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the penal law, the mental hygiene law, and the public health law, in relation to prohibiting health professionals from engaging in electroconvulsive therapy; creates the crime of performance of electroconvulsive therapy
